tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  patient_age INT,
  patient_gender VARCHAR(10),
  patient_address VARCHAR(100),
  patient_medical_history TEXT,
  patient_contact_number VARCHAR(15),
  patient_email VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    patient_dob DATE NOT NULL,
    patient_gender CHAR(1),
    encrypted_data BYTEA NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
    appointment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID NOT NULL,
    appointment_date DATE NOT NULL,
    appointment_time TIME NOT NULL,
    doctor_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  patient_dob DATE,
  patient_address VARCHAR(100),
  patient_gender ENUM('Male', 'Female', 'Other'),
  patient_phone VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE MedicalRecords (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  record_date DATE,
  diagnosis VARCHAR(255),
  prescription VARCHAR(255),
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE BlockchainData (
  block_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  blockchain_hash VARCHAR(64),
  blockchain_data TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  dob DATE,
  address VARCHAR(100),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
  appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  doctor_id INT,
  appointment_date DATE,
  start_time TIME,
  end_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE medical_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  doctor_id INT,
  appointment_id INT,
  diagnosis VARCHAR(200),
  prescription VARCHAR(200)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  patient_dob DATE,
  patient_gender VARCHAR(10),
  patient_address VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE Doctors (
  doctor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  doctor_name VARCHAR(50),
  doctor_specialty VARCHAR(50),
  doctor_license_number VARCHAR(20),
  doctor_email VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Appointments (
  appointment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  appointment_date TIMESTAMP,
  patient_id UUID,
  doctor_id UUID,
  appointment_reason VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE MedicalRecords (
  record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID,
  doctor_id UUID,
  record_date TIMESTAMP,
  diagnosis TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE BlockchainData (
  data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  record_id UUID,
  blockchain_hash VARCHAR(100),
  blockchain_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  blockchain_confirmation BOOLEAN
)
